summary: AIR BAG LIGHT IS ON.  KIA DEALER SAYS THEY NEED TO REPLACE THE WEIGHT SENSOR MAT ON THE PASSENGER SEAT WITH THE PART COSTING $2400.  ODD THAT SO MANY PEOPLE HAVE THIS PROBLEM AND THE COST OF THE PART VARIES BY OVER $1000!  THIS SHOULD BE COVERED BY THE EXTENDED WARRANTY!  CAR ONLY HAS 80,000 MILES ON IT.
